categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Selanno was a male Human who served as an officer in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War. During the Quesh war on the planet Quesh, he was stationed at the Imperial Garrison.
Selanno appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Specialty Goods vendor for Imperial players on Quesh.
